text: ya aap ke apne liye koyi sone ka ghar ho jaaye ya aap aasmaan par chad jaaye aur hum to aap ke chad jaane ka bhi us waqt tak har giz yaqeen nahi karenge jab tak ke aap hum par koyi kitaab na utaar laaye jise hum khud padle, aap jawaab de de ke mera parvardigaar paak hai, main to sirf ek insaan hee ho jo rasool banaya gaya hoon
